EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #13.2019 Dealer Update #13
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - May 20, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | May 2019
FANS1/A+ & PM-CPDLC Upgrade
- This bulletin announces the availability of an Upgrade Program to provide FANS 1/A+ operations and PM-CPDLC capability for operators with F900A/B/C/EX, Citation X, CL601, Legacy 600/650 and DO-328 - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-33 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-33-Rev-FANS-1A-PM-CPDLC-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
ADS-B Out Upgrade Program​​
- For Embraer 190 Lineage 1000 operators, Honeywell is pleased to offer a fully compliant upgrade to meet the worldwide mandates for Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) Out. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-36 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-36%20Primus EPIC Embraer Lineage 1000 ADS-B Out Upgrade.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
